name: citomni/kernel
description: Ultra-lean application kernel for CitOmni-based apps. PHP 8.2+, PSR-4, deterministic boot, zero runtime magic.

suggest.ext-apcu: Speed up Composer's class loading in production
suggest.citomni/http: HTTP runtime: Kernel+router+request/response+error handler for web apps
suggest.citomni/cli: CLI runtime: Kernel+command runner with the same deterministic boot
suggest.citomni/infrastructure: Shared infra services (db, log, mail, txt) for HTTP & CLI
suggest.citomni/auth: User accounts, login/registration, and member profile flows
suggest.citomni/testing: Dev-only integration test harness; zero prod overhead
